text: 18.37: Zo 8.47; 1 T 6.13; 1 Zo 3.19; 4.6Pairat thav ana nzarigi, “Maaŋgi, ndu guigira ŋgui vhɨrve gari guma pana the, e?” Zisas mbara ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pana nzuai kameŋ, ne ndun kameŋra. Nan niamuuŋ na tegi, gu kha nuianan hɨgi, gu ŋaara bavira muun zav hɨgi. Gu buni guarira bun suaŋrim, kha gumgi gu mbigi na buni mbarararga. Mba buni guari mbararav nta zɨn vui gumgi, mbe na buni mbararagi.”
